title: Ahhh such a pain, this is an animu/waifu thread
body:
Today even the line threads is less boring than most of the stuff its being posted, i wanted to take a break but since we need some color i guess ill be posting about animu :^)

http://i.imgur.com/sTkN6SV.png

http://i.imgur.com/3Kwziyb.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/DZRjf4r.jpg?1

Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun: wew great comedy animu if you ask me, characters are really enjoyable, voice actors really fit the characters, Chiyo's voice fit like a glove tbh, cant complain and needs a seconds season, some people say "if you want to keep up with it just read the mango"

http://i.imgur.com/cyQAzLo.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/7uE2WEs.png

http://i.imgur.com/TcJcLKp.jpg

man i hate reading mango because i usually forget about it but damn i somehow feel like fast reading this one...which reminds me that

http://i.imgur.com/jdk90YN.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/0L2fLqd.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/5EWVSBa.jpg

hmmmm i regret not doing what i had to do today so you know, if feel like a lazy piece of art when it comes to do something just get up and do it, dont be like me, yes you shouldn't, maybe its because i haven't ate anything today so remember to eat something, at least breakfast, avoid any unnecessary sugar unless you planning to do some sports maybe or any demanding physical activity tbh

http://i.imgur.com/iegKDbn.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/1IdDFe5.jpg?1

http://i.imgur.com/HJO2CrW.png

So today im posting a great song imo, shhhh its just great listen to it trust me i know its engrish but it sounds really really nice oh and ZoE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uzw2GvVZV0U

song image btw just in case somebody wants it

http://i.imgur.com/pAn9uxz.jpg

ZoE, ZoE, ZoE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Niruwh4UwS8
